mapper.select: select # 如果praise_stat的值=PRAISE.code的值，则将1加到praiseCount上，否则将0加到praiseCount上 # 将需要的数据全部查出来，再按需分类，避免多次查询，非常巧妙 sum(if(f.praise_stat = ${@ink.whi.api.model.enums.DocumentTypeEnum@PRAISE.code}, 1, 0)) as praiseCount, sum(if(f.collection_stat = ${@ink.whi.api.model.enums.PraiseStatEnum@COLLECTION.code}, 1, 0)) as collectionCount, avg(r.`cnt`) as readCount from read_count as r left join user_foot f on r.document_id = f.document_id where r.document_type = ${@ink.whi.api.model.enums.DocumentTypeEnum@ARTICLE.code} and r.document_id = #{articleId}

select sum(if(f.praise_stat = ${@ink.whi.api.model.enums.DocumentTypeEnum@PRAISE.code}, 1, 0)) as praiseCount, sum(if(f.collection_stat = ${@ink.whi.api.model.enums.PraiseStatEnum@COLLECTION.code}, 1, 0)) as collectionCount, avg(r.`cnt`) as readCount from read_count as r left join user_foot f on r.document_id = f.document_id and f.document_type = r.document_type where r.document_type = ${@ink.whi.api.model.enums.DocumentTypeEnum@ARTICLE.code} and f.document_user_id = #{userId}
